item.title: :( Dark Bow Special
item.dc:creator: @F-0-N-Z-Y F-0-N-Z-Y
item.description:
@F-0-N-Z-Y wrote:

loek20:

srry i am so stupit but must i remove usebow = true in line…?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2008, 05:13:35 AM[/size][hr]lol i change usebow = true in usebow = line and do u know nothing happed :eek:

please, do not call yourself stupid.

when you find the darkbow id, like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156)
{
PkingDelay = 4;
wepdelay = 4;
UseBow = true;
}

replace that with:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156)
{
PkingDelay = 4;
wepdelay = 4;
}

(all i did was remove “UseBow = true;” from the code)

item.title: :( Dark Bow Special
item.dc:creator: @F-0-N-Z-Y F-0-N-Z-Y
item.description:
@F-0-N-Z-Y wrote:

[quote=“loek20, post:17, topic:200342”]is this it…?
public void darkbow() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156) {
setAnimation(426);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(45);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
SpecDamgNPC(45);
SpecialDelay -= 1;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(50);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        startAnimation(426);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecDamg(50);
        SpecialDelay -= 1;[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2008, 04:55:12 AM[/size][hr]i think this is it but what must i do with it...?

}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156
&& specialAmount >= 50) {
ProjectileSpec(380, absY, absX, offsetY,
offsetX, AttackingOn, EnemyY,
EnemyX);
calculateSpecial();
darkbow();
usingSpecial = true;
specialDamage = 43;
specialDamage2 = 43;[/quote]

search what i said in my above post, and remove the “UseBow = true;” line

item.title: :( Dark Bow Special
item.dc:creator: @F-0-N-Z-Y F-0-N-Z-Y
item.description:
@F-0-N-Z-Y wrote:

neither of those (ill find it in my server and post)

(MAKE A BACKUP OF YOUR SOURCE!)
here it is:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861)
{
PkingDelay = 4;
wepdelay = 4;
UseBow = true;
}

replace the 861 with the dbow id, then find it,
then remove the:

UseBow = true;

save and compile!

Read full topic

item.title: :( Dark Bow Special
item.dc:creator: @F-0-N-Z-Y F-0-N-Z-Y
item.description:
@F-0-N-Z-Y wrote:

ok, you need to “remove” darkbow from the range parts of “client.java” (just replace it with karils xbow)

the special will not work unless the darkbow “ISN’T!” in range.

it must be classed as a MELEE weapon in order for “CZAR specials” to work properly.

so just make it a melee weapon, and the special will work.

Read full topic
